item.title: Archetype - HackTheBox Writeup
item.description: Enumeration Scan We’ll start with a simple port scan with nmap: kyb3r@cipher ~: nmap -sV -sC 10.10.10.27 Starting Nmap 7 ( https://nmap.org ) Nmap scan report for 10.10.10.27 Host is up (0.10s latency). Not shown: 996 closed ports PORT STATE SERVICE VERSION 135/tcp open msrpc Microsoft Windows RPC 139/tcp open netbios-ssn Microsoft Windows netbios-ssn 445/tcp open microsoft-ds Windows Server 2019 Standard 17763 microsoft-ds 1433/tcp open ms-sql-s Microsoft SQL Server 2017 14.

item.title: The privacy a right or a stupidity?
Why not create more Linux distributions
item.description: Debian I want you to think about the number of Debian “distributions"that you know, this number is huge and they are distros that are useless and only damage Linux because many things have to be repackaged and makes use more difficult. So why create another Linux “distribution”? For a better desktop environment, you can do it but why better not create the configuration and turn it into a script and that anyone can install it on their Linux
